document_data.name: ''Reptar's Wall''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Reptar's wall''''' was a large, heavy [[magic]]al [[iron]] [[shield]] of unknown origin. It earned its name for its use by the [[ranger]] known as [[Reptar]].
document_data.Powers:
This ''+1 shield'' was impervious to rust and corrosion and did not conduct heat or cold, thus protecting its wielder. It was also magically ''[[silence]]d'' and gave no sound when struck, dropped, or otherwise handled.

''Reptar's wall'' possessed two [[command word]]s, both of which were engraved on its inner frame:
* "''Eiruvan''" granted ''[[invisibility]]'' and lent its silencing effects to its wielder. They could not be revealed by most magical means, but lost their concealing effects upon their next attack.
* "''Thammis''" allowed the shieldbearer to ''[[fly]]'' as per the [[spell]] of the same name.
